name: Ligma Bones
description: Ligma Bones is a single-player platformer game where players control Ligma, your typical skeleton boy who seeks to escape the castle. Inspired by the game “Dreadstone Keep” by Totem, the game seeks to connect the said game to its own after the “Cleanser” Legacy Event. As the main protagonist in Dreadstone Keep manages to kill a hundred enemies, Ligma decides to escape the castle before he gets killed. However, other skeletons found this unfair so they try to stop him, thus he has to face not only the “Hero” but also his former brothers as he makes a daring dash before he meets his fate.
